title: Demand Generation Strategist
job_overview:
Pod: Marketing Execution
Reports To: Growth Lead / Strategy Pod
Type: 0.5 FTE (4 hours/day)
Location: Remote
Core Hours: 3+ hours overlap with 8am–12pm CST
Compensation: Based on FTE commitment and lead performance

About the Role
We’re looking for someone to run point on organic and paid lead generation—blending SEO and media to build inbound systems that convert. You’ll work cross-functionally to power ranking gains, funnel traffic, and reduce cost-per-lead.

Key Responsibilities
SEO & Organic Growth
- Perform technical audits and keyword research
- Build SEO briefs and collaborate with writers
- Track rankings and report monthly performance

Paid Media Support
- Support in building keyword-targeted Google and LinkedIn campaigns
- Monitor CPL, MQL quality, and conversion paths

Strategy & Reporting
- Contribute to quarterly content and ad planning
- Own Looker Studio/GA4 dashboards

Who You Are
- 3–5 years of SEO and paid media experience
- Strong with SEMrush/Ahrefs, GA4, and basic CRO
- Bonus: Experience inside B2B or agency ecosystems

What You Won’t Be Doing
- Writing copy or building websites
- Managing clients or outbound SDR functions

Why This Role Stands Out
- Strategy plus execution ownership
- Performance-based clarity around success metrics
- Room to expand into broader growth initiatives

How to Apply
- Send examples of ranking improvements or CPL gains
- Share 1 dashboard or client snapshot if possible
